page.title: 09A Garden In Kirby Muxloe
page.content: We went to visit a lovely garden.It belonged to Mr and Mrs LeMay.We looked at the lawn and we could see the ridges and furrows from when the land was ploughed,long ago.Mr and Mrs LeMay told us that they needed to spend 5 hours on the lawns and 5 hours on the garden each week to keep them looking nice.They had lots of lovely trees and a very old hawthorn hedge in the garden.They also had a vegetable garden which I found the most interesting.They grew:- rhubarb,mint,black currants,runner beans,raspberry,cabbage,strawberry, onions,lettuce,carrots,beetroot,broad beans,potatoes,brussel sprouts,and cauliflower We felt the compost heap and it was quite warm.We could even see steam rising from it.Mr and Mrs LeMay were very kind and gave us drinks.{Sarah G.
